question: In some cultures, children are often toldthat they can achieve anything if they try hard enough. What are the advantages and disadvantages of given children this message?
text: Childhood is the best era for changing their mind towards the betterment of the future. Hence, in some traditions, kids are often told that they are able to succeed at anything if they have enough dedication. This essay will be elaborated on the pros and cons of giving this idea to youngsters.

To begin with, the above belief will create a more educated society in the future. As, the improvement of morals, which is required to gain a higher position in future will create in the toddler’s mind. Due to that, they will study hard and become the most valuable individuals in society one day. For instance, recent research has found that 85% of top-positioned persons in Sri Lankan Medical services had succeeded in their younger-aged ambition which was to become a doctor. Furthermore, kids who have targets to explore new things are also engaged in innovations and they may contribute to the well-being of society.

Despite the above, the drawbacks are also there. Since someone may have to be in a top position in notorious action as a result of the environment where they lived. Hence, those uncontrollable youth will do mal-functions in the future. To illustrate, a recently dead person who was known as the king among drug dealers had entered the field when he was at 10 years of age. Moreover, a higher competition to arise among the pupils and it will cause to reduce the humanity of them. Similarly, a selfish person would create when they are growing older.

To conclude, by teaching to succeed at anything for the youth society which depicts many gains and losses in future society as a result of this and by considering all the facts together, it has proven in this essay.
